comment: A metric ` D ` is complete iff all Cauchy sequences converge to a point in the space. The proof uses countable choice. Part of Definition 1.4-3 of [Kreyszig] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
